    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public java.lang.String convert(java.lang.Object valueToConvert)
        Description copied from interface: TypeConverter
        Converts the value to an string representation that can be handled by DBUnit. The provided value has to be of the type that can be handled by the provider and must not be null.

        If value is if wrong type or value is null IllegalArgumentException gets thrown.

        Specified by:
        convert in interface TypeConverter
        Parameters:
        valueToConvert - value to be converted to string representation.
        Returns:
        the string representation of the given value has to be returned. may be null.

      • getResponsibleFor

        public java.lang.Class<?> getResponsibleFor()
        Description copied from interface: TypeConverter
        What type of instances can be treated/converted by this implementation. Example: for a java.util.Date converter you would return the class java.util.Date here.
        Specified by:
        getResponsibleFor in interface TypeConverter
        Returns:
        the class that can be handled by the implementation. must never return null.

        public static java.lang.String createXMLDateTime(java.util.Date date)
